'''1.21.5 Pre-Release 3''' (known as '''1.21.5-pre3''' in the [[launcher]]) is the third and final pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.21.5]], released on March 18, 2025.<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-21-5-pre-release-3|Minecraft 1.21.5 Pre-Release 3|May 28, 2025}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
{{Fixes|project=MC|fixedin=1.21.5 Pre-release 3
|;dev
|MC-297384|The second horn in the cold cow texture is unused by the model
|;prev
|MC-295387|fireball and small_fireball can no longer have their Owner, HasBeenShot, or LeftOwner fields modified
|MC-299223|F3 debug crosshair lost its outline
|MC-299543|Experience orbs follow players in Spectator mode
}}</onlyinclude>
